description: Fursatkum Accounting System - Comprehensive financial management platform with dual-ledger accounting, invoice management, employee loan tracking, and salary processing

requirements.name: Authentication
requirements.description: User authentication and authorization using JWT tokens
acceptanceCriteria: User can login with valid credentials
JWT token is stored after successful login
Unauthenticated users are redirected to login
Invalid credentials are rejected

requirements.name: Dashboard
requirements.description: Dashboard overview with balances, invoice counts, and recent transactions
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays cash and bank balances
Invoice counts (income, spending, deleted) are shown
Recent transactions are displayed
Outstanding loans total is shown
Current month salary total is shown

requirements.name: Invoice Management
requirements.description: Create, read, update, delete invoices (income and spending) with dual ledger support
acceptanceCriteria: User can create income invoices
User can create spending invoices
Balance validation prevents negative balances
Invoices can be filtered by type, ledger, status, date
Invoices can be edited with reason tracking
Invoices can be soft deleted with reversal transactions
Documents can be attached to invoices
Reference numbers are auto-generated (F-INC-XXX, F-SPD-XXX)

requirements.name: Employee Management
requirements.description: Create, read, update employees with monthly salary tracking
acceptanceCriteria: User can create employee records
Employee monthly salary is tracked
Employees can be searched and filtered
Employee details show loan and salary history
Employees can be updated

requirements.name: Employee Loan Management
requirements.description: Issue loans to employees, track repayments, and manage loan status
acceptanceCriteria: User can issue loans to employees
Loans require sufficient balance validation
Monthly deduction amounts can be set
Loans can be repaid partially or fully
Loan status updates automatically (active/paid)
Reference numbers are auto-generated (F-LOAN-XXX)
Loan summary shows total outstanding loans

requirements.name: Salary Payment
requirements.description: Process employee salary payments with automatic loan deduction
acceptanceCriteria: User can process salary payments
Active loans are automatically deducted from salary
Multiple loans are handled (oldest first)
Deduction calculation: min(monthlyDeduction, remainingAmount, grossSalary)
Net paid = grossSalary - totalDeduction
Loans are marked 'paid' when fully repaid
Reference numbers are auto-generated (F-SAL-XXX)
Salary summary shows current month totals

requirements.name: Accounting & Transactions
requirements.description: View accounting summary and transaction history
acceptanceCriteria: User can view cash and bank balances
Transaction history is displayed with filters
All transaction types are shown with correct labels
Transactions are color-coded (income=green, spending=red, etc.)

requirements.name: Navigation & UI
requirements.description: Navigation menu and user interface elements
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu displays all menu items
RTL layout support for Arabic
Error messages display in Arabic
UI is responsive and accessible

businessRules: Loan deductions applied oldest loan first
All edits require reason and are logged
Reference numbers are sequential and unique
